name: kairo-workspace

scripts.app:dev: pkill -f electron 2>/dev/null || true && pkill -f Electron 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:3000,3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && cd kairo-platform && NODE_ENV=development npx electron electron/main.js
scripts.app:build: cd kairo-platform && npm run web:build && npx electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.app:pack: cd kairo-platform && npm run web:build && npx electron-builder

description: Kairo Multi-Agent Development Platform - Now with Desktop App Support
